title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 76 - Drivers' Schools
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 76 - Drivers' Schools

State Regulations

Registration Procedure (§ 76.1 to 76.6 to 76.7)

Required Records (§ 76.8 to 76.9 to 76.10)

Equipment (§ 76.11 to 76.12)

Instructors and Instruction (§ 76.15 to 76.16)

Advertising (§ 76.21 to 76.22)

Suspension, Revocation and Refusal to Renew (§ 76.23)

Classroom Instruction (§ 76.30 to 76.31)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 76

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§215, 394

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
